desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人在詠葉部長的幫助下，成功甩開女僕部狙擊手花凛，但另一名女僕部成員明日奈卻出現在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.thai: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.ko: When Midori thought they were away from the threats, a single shot of sniping bullet fired against them. Momoi realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Midori and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 就在桃井一行人以為已經逃離了威脅後，一發狙擊子彈向他們飛來，綠立刻意識到是狙擊手花凜所為。在樓頂上，就在花凜準備繼續下一發時，工程部及時阻止並擾亂了計劃。桃井等人立刻繼續前進。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。

desc.en: Akane blew up the doors successfully. When attempting to take the lift, a power failure occurred.
desc.jp: Akane blew up the doors successfully. When attempting to take the lift, a power failure occurred.
desc.thai: Akane blew up the doors successfully. When attempting to take the lift, a power failure occurred.
desc.ko: Akane blew up the doors successfully. When attempting to take the lift, a power failure occurred.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音成功炸開了卷閘門，欲乘電梯時突然停電。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜成功炸开了卷闸门，欲乘电梯时突然停电。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音成功炸开了卷闸门，欲乘电梯时突然停电。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 朱音成功炸开了卷闸门，欲乘电梯时突然停电。

desc.en: Though Midori and Momoi arrived at the front door of Contraband Room, they were ambushed by Asuna.

desc.thai: Though Midori and Momoi arrived at the front door of Contraband Room, they were ambushed by Asuna.
desc.ko: Though Midori and Momoi arrived at the front door of Contraband Room, they were ambushed by Asuna.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井與綠雖然到達保管所門口，卻遇到明日奈的埋伏。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井与绿虽然到达保管所门口，却遇到明日奈的埋伏。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.thai: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.ko: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_tw: 因為耽誤到時間的關係，朱音和花凛也從封鎖中解放出來。就這樣，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危機。這時，愛麗絲及時現身解救遊戲開發部，讓一行人成功進入學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.thai: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.ko: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 優香命令將收繳來的機器人加入戰場，明日奈的戰力也絕非等閒之輩，工程部無力壓制狙擊手花凜，朱音也正在趕來。在似乎無望之際，眾人想起了之前會議的內容。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.ko: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.zh_tw: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.thai: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.ko: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人認為計劃的容錯率完全為零，因而需要準備後備計劃。停電後，愛麗絲檢測到時機成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.thai: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.ko: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 優香等人終於到齊，宣佈了要把遊戲開發部關禁閉的處分。愛麗絲突然出現，以光之劍破除了障礙；花凜也被重新壓制。愛麗絲特別提到，在所有RPG遊戲中，勇者是從來不會放棄同伴的。受到鼓勵的眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.jp: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.thai: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.ko: Himari visits Rio, the Seminar president. The two discuss the incident that happened between the Game Development Department and C&C and begin to discuss Aris' identity. The meeting turns into a disaster when the two are unable to bridge the gap between their opinions on Aris. However, things take a turn for the worse when Himari is suddenly attacked.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵去見研討會的部長莉央。兩人在談論先前遊戲開發部與C&C發生的事，並且針對愛麗絲的真實身分交換彼此的意見。但兩人卻沒能縮小對於愛麗絲立場的差異，兩人的會面最後宣告破局，後來陽葵遭到某人的襲擊。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来日鞠遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来阳葵遭到某人的袭击。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵去见研讨会的部长莉央。两人在谈论先前游戏开发部与C&C发生的事，并且针对爱丽丝的真实身分交换彼此的意见。但两人却没能缩小对于爱丽丝立场的差异，两人的会面最后声明破局，后来阳葵遭到某人的袭击。

desc.en: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.jp: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.thai: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.
desc.ko: Rio and Himari met in secret and started to sort out the current situations.

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.thai: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.ko: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Rio and Himari designed the conflict between the Game Development Club and C&C, and observed Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.jp: Rio and Himari designed the conflict between the Game Development Club and C&C, and observed Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.thai: Rio and Himari designed the conflict between the Game Development Club and C&C, and observed Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.ko: Rio and Himari designed the conflict between the Game Development Club and C&C, and observed Aris' true identity: the Princess of the Nameless Gods. Based on this, Rio believed that Aris is "the weapon that will lead the world to the end", yet Himari thought that she's just a "cute junior".
desc.zh_tw: 莉央和陽葵共同策劃了遊戲開發部與C&C的衝突這一件事，並從中觀測到了愛麗絲的真實身份：無名眾神的公主。基於這點，莉央認為愛麗絲是“使世界引導到終結的武器”，而陽葵則認為她只是一個“可愛的後輩”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央和日鞠共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而日鞠则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉央和阳葵共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而阳葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央和阳葵共同策划了游戏开发部与C&C的冲突这一件事，并从中观测到了爱丽丝的真实身份：无名众神的公主。基于这点，莉央认为爱丽丝是“使世界引导到终结的武器”，而阳葵则认为她只是一个“可爱的后辈”。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.thai: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.ko: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵固守著自己的結論，與莉央產生了嚴重分歧。莉央試圖用AMAS將陽葵困住，但陽葵輕鬆駭入了房間和AMAS的系統，逃出了房間。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.thai: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.ko: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵來到房間外的走廊，自言自語笑話著莉央的固執。然而這時陽葵卻被一位不明人士——傳說中的第五位C&C成員——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
